TEXT.TITLE: ANHEUSER-BUSCH <BUD> SETS HIGHER SPENDING
TEXT.BODY: Anheuser-Busch Cos Inc in its annual report said its capital expenditures for 1987 are expected to approximate 900 mln dlrs. In 1986, Anheuser said it spent 777.3 mln dlrs, up from 601.0 mln dlrs the prior year. Reuter
